DOC.brief_summary: The goal research project determine age inactivity reduce muscle anabolic effect nutrient lead muscle functional loss . The central hypothesis age reduces mTORC1 signal expression skeletal muscle amino acid transporter response anabolic stimulation lead reduced muscle adaptation increase intracellular amino acid requirement . The investigator hypothesize inactivity exacerbates effect significant muscle functional loss , rehabilitation restores muscle signal , metabolism function baseline value .
DOC.brief_title: Nutrient Regulation Amino Acid Transporters Aging Human Skeletal Muscle
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1835 6075 yr 2 . Ability sign inform consent 3 . Minimental state exam score > 26 4 . Freeliving , prior admission 1 . Cardiac abnormality consider exclusionary study physician ( e.g. , CHF , CAD , righttoleft shunt ) 2 . Uncontrolled endocrine metabolic disease ( e.g. , hypo/hyperthyroidism , diabetes ) 3 . GFR < 65 mL/min/1.73m2 evidence kidney disease failure 4 . Vascular disease risk factor peripheral atherosclerosis . ( e.g. , uncontrolled hypertension , obesity , diabetes , hypercholesterolemia > 250 mg/dl , claudication evidence venous arterial insufficiency upon palpitation femoral , popliteal pedal artery ) 5 . Risk DVT include family history thrombophilia , DVT , pulmonary embolus , myeloproliferative disease include polycythemia ( Hb > 18 g/dL ) thrombocytosis ( platelet > 400x103/mL ) , connective tissue disease ( positive lupus anticoagulant ) , hyperhomocysteinemia , deficiency factor V Leiden , proteins S C , antithrombin III 6 . Use anticoagulant therapy . ( e.g. , Coumadin , heparin ) 7 . Prior history HeparinInduced Thrombocytopenia ( HIT ) 8 . Elevated systolic pressure > 150 diastolic blood pressure > 100 9 . Implanted electronic device ( e.g. , pacemaker , electronic infusion pump , stimulators ) 10 . Cancer history successfully treat cancer ( less 1 year ) basal cell carcinoma 11 . Currently weightloss diet body mass index > 30 kg/m2 12 . Inability abstain smoke duration study 13 . A history > 20 pack per year smoking 14 . HIV hepatitis B C* 15 . Recent anabolic corticosteroid use ( within 3 month ) 16 . Subjects hemoglobin hematocrit lower accept lab value 17 . Agitation/aggression disorder ( psychiatric history exam ) 18 . History stroke motor disability 19 . A recent history ( < 12 month ) GI bleed 20 . Pregnancy determine pregnancy test 21 . Depression [ > 5 15 item Geriatric Depression Scale ( GDS ) ] 22 . Alcohol drug abuse 23 . Exercise training ( > 1 session moderate high intensity aerobic resistance exercise/week ) 24 . Liver disease ( AST/ALT 2 time normal limit , hyperbilirubinemia ) 25 . Respiratory disease ( acute upper respiratory infection , history chronic lung disease rest oxygen saturation < 97 % room air ) 26 . Any condition event consider exclusionary PI faculty physician
